name: on_farm
description: Is this observation on farm (not on an expermiment station)

name: is_survey
description: Is this observation from a survey (not an experiment)

name: treatment
description: Description of the treatment, if any. Can be a code used in the original data. There are no rules about its content or format

name: rep
description: Replication number (1, 2, 3, ...) For this specific observation

name: intercrops
description: Other crop grown together with the main crop

name: previous_crop
description: Crop grown on this plot in the prior season

name: crop_rotation
description: Crops grown in rotation on this plot

name: dmy_roots
description: Dry-matter weight biomass of fine roots per ha

name: dmy_stems
description: Dry-matter weight biomass of stems per ha

name: dmy_leaves
description: Dry-matter weight biomass of leaves per ha

name: dmy_storage
description: Dry-matter weight biomass of storage organs per ha

name: dmy_total
description: Dry-matter weight total biomass per ha

name: dmy_residue
description: Dry-matter weight residue biomass per ha

name: fwy_roots
description: Fresh weight biomass of fine roots per ha

name: fwy_stems
description: Fresh weight biomass of stems per ha

name: fwy_leaves
description: Fresh weight biomass of leaves per ha

name: fwy_storage
description: Fresh weight biomass of storage organs per ha

name: fwy_total
description: Fresh weight total biomass per ha

name: fwy_residue
description: Fresh weight residue biomass per ha

name: yield_part
description: The part of the crop that "yield" refers to (e.g. grain, tubers, roots, leaves, fruit)

name: yield
description: Biomass of the main harvestable parts at maturity, per ha --- not specified whether fresh or dr- matter

name: fw_yield
description: Fresh-weight biomass of the main harvestable parts at maturity, per ha

name: dm_yield
description: Dry-matter biomass of the main harvestable parts at maturity, per ha

name: yield_moisture
description: Reported moisture content of fresh yield

name: yield_marketable
description: Fresh weight marketable (e.g. large enough tubers) biomass of the main harvestable parts at maturity, per ha

name: fertilizer_date
description: Date(s) of inorganic fertilizer applications. Possibly followed by "(product; amount)"

name: fertilizer_dap
description: Inorganic fertilizer applications in "days after planting". Possibly followed by "(product; amount)"

name: fertilizer_amount
description: Total amount of inorganic fertilizer applied

name: N_splits
description: Number of splits in the N_fertilizer application

name: N_fert_level
description: Qualtiative description of N fertilizer amount

name: P_fertilizer
description: P applied in inorganic fertilizer (as P, not P2O5)

name: K_fertilizer
description: K applied in inorganic fertilizer (as K, not K2O)

name: P_organic
description: P applied in organic fertilizer (as P, not P2O5)

name: K_organic
description: K applied in organic fertilizer (as K, not K2O)

name: irrigation_number
description: How many times was the crop irrigated?

name: irrigation_amount
description: The total irrigation amount applied to the crop

name: irrigation_dates
description: Irrigation dates in "yyyy-mm-dd", "yyyy-mm", or "yyyy" format; separated by "; "

name: plot_area
description: Area of the plot in square meter

name: plot_length
description: Length of the plot in meter

name: plot_width
description: Width of the plot in meter

name: seed_density
description: Number of plants per ha that were seeded/planted (seeding rate)

name: plant_density
description: Number of plants per ha that emerged/survived

name: rain
description: Total rainfall between planting and harvest

name: anthesis_days
description: Days to anthesis (after planting). Anthesis occurs when pollen is released

name: ear_height
description: height of first ear (maize female inflorescence)

name: AUDPC
description: Area under the disease progress curve (the sum of fraction infected (not percentage))

name: rAUDPC
description: Area under the disease progress curve divided by the non-diseased season length

name: root_AMF
description: Root colonization by arbuscular micorrhizal fungi

name: season_constraint
description: a constraint that occurred in this particular season (e.g. drought, flood)

name: herbicide_product
description: name(s) of the active ingredient of the herbicide

name: herbicide_timing
description: days after (or before) planting on which herbicide was used

name: herbicide_dates
description: herbicide appliacation dates in "yyyy-mm-dd", "yyyy-mm", or "yyyy" format; separated by "; "

name: weeding_times
description: how many times was the crop weeded?

name: weeding_dates
description: weeding dates in "yyyy-mm-dd", "yyyy-mm", or "yyyy" format; separated by "; "

name: weed_severity
description: how severe was the competition from weeds?

name: insecticide_product
description: name(s) of the active ingredient of the insecticide

name: insecticide_dates
description: insecticide appliacation dates in "yyyy-mm-dd", "yyyy-mm", or "yyyy" format; separated by "; "

name: insecticide_timing
description: days after (or before) planting on which insecticide was used

name: pest_severity
description: how severe was the pest damage?

name: fungicide_product
description: name(s) of the active ingredient of the fungicide

name: fungicide_dates
description: fungicide appliacation dates in "yyyy-mm-dd", "yyyy-mm", or "yyyy" format; separated by "; "

name: fungicide_timing
description: days after (or before) planting on which fungicide was used

name: disease_severity
description: how severe was the disease damage?

name: residue_prevcrop
description: how much residue of the previous crop is on the field?

name: residue_prevcrop_used
description: Was the residue of the previous crop left on the field?

name: mulch
description: how much mulch is on the field?

name: seed_treatment
description: chemical or biological products applied to the seed

name: crop_cut
description: was the yield (in a survey) determined with a crop cut?

name: previous_crop_residue_weight
description: weight of residue of previous crop that stayed on the field

name: previous_crop_residue_perc
description: percentage of residue of previous crop that stayed on the field

name: previous_crop_burnt
description: was the residue of the previous crop burnt?

name: previous_crop_residue_management
description: how was the previous crop residue managed?

name: crop_price
description: current crop price when sold to market

name: flood_stress
description: how severe was the damage from flooding?

name: drought_stress
description: how severe was the damage from drought?

name: LAI
description: leaf area index (presumbably the max; this needs to be improved, it should be linked to a date and/or growht stage)

name: harvest_index
description: harvest index (100 * yield / (total biomass)), normally as dry weight

name: farmer_gender
description: gender of farmer (on-farm trials or survey)

name: virus_severity
description: how severe was the virus infection?

name: striga_damage
description: was yield affected by the striga parasite?

name: house_distance
description: Distance of field to the house of the person managing the field

name: severity_scale
description: Scale of (disease) severity measure, from low to high. E.g. 1-9
